metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Motion Picture Managers (Of Love) is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: The Motion Picture Managers (Of Love) has sections analyzed in the following keys: B Major,  and E Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
